txt.en: Let Rendal know when you're ready to enter Gaervarad.\n\nHe waits for you outside.
'Whether or not you need my aid -- should you use this whistle, I'll be there.'

'A new start for Watcyn is now possible. I only hope he realizes that there is more to life than just survival -- perhaps with my help, if he is willing.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. You have a good heart; don't let the world take that away.'
Use the whistle to summon Rendal to your side
Watcyn needs all the help he can get.
Use the whistle to summon Rendal to your side
Use the whistle in Gaervarad to summon Rendal
Rendal believes that defeating a few captains will cause them to have second doubts about hunting down deserters.\n\nYou should defeat captains around Gaervarad.
You have defeated enough captains.\n\nYou should speak with Rendal. Use the whistle in Gaervarad to summon Rendal to your side.
Use the whistle in Gaervarad to summon Rendal

'There must be several of these captains walking around, but defeating just a few will send enough of a message. Between the two of us, that shouldn't be too difficult.\n\n'I'll let you decide how you want to approach this. When you are ready, let me know.'
